subject: how to run test suite to completion
msgSnippet: I m using JUnit (w/o Ant) to run a sequence of tests.  I m adding all tests to a suite and calling run(TestResults) on the suite.  However, the test only runs
messageBody:
I'm using JUnit (w/o Ant) to run a sequence of tests. I'm adding all tests
to a suite and calling run(TestResults) on the suite. However, the test
only runs until it experiences one failure. How do I specify to run
completely so I can collect failures from each test? Thanks.
